202 

THE SMALL FRUITS OF NEW YORK 

census. For some reason, those in charge of the census combined the 
 loganberry with raspberries rather than dewberries, allowance for which 
 must be made in interpreting the figures in the table that follows. 

Table 2. Acreage, Yield and Value of Blackberries and Dewberries in the United States
